title: Explain transparency and limits on trans. in China

content.question: Explain what it means to say that a government has transparency. Describe two examples that show how the Chinese government since 1997 limits transparency.

frqParts.text: Explain what it means to say that a government has transparency. Describe two examples that show how the Chinese government since 1997 limits transparency.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
